songs.title: I Do It for My Hood
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yo
I do it for my streets
I do it for my hood
I do it for my mom
I do what's good
I do it for my cat
I do it for my dog
I do it for my hamster
I do it for my fish

[Chorus]
Oooh, I do it for my hood
I do it for my hood
Oooh, I do it for my hood
I do it for my hood

[Verse 1]
If you wanna come to my hood, come, test me
I'm  chillin' in the streets hanging out like my testes
I do it for my city
I do it for my hood
I do it for my city
I do it for the streets, man

[Chorus]
Oooh, I do it for my hood (pop, pop, pop!)
I do it for my hood (yeah!)
Oooh, I do it for my hood
I said I do it for my hood

[Verse 2]
I'm selling cocaine in the streets like groceries
Except it's not groceries, it's cocaine
I never have sex with a condom on
'Cause I wanna repopulate my city
My city!
My hood
Repopulate my hood
Repopulate my hood
Repopulate my hood

[Outro]
I do it for my city
I do it for my hood
I do it for my city
I do it for my hood
I do it for my cat
I do it for my dog
I do it for my bird
I do it for my fish
